scripts.dev:all: concurrently -k "powershell -Command \"cd ../../..; python -m datacenter.server\"" "powershell -Command \"$ErrorActionPreference='SilentlyContinue'; $pids = (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5173).OwningProcess; $pids = Select-Object -Unique -InputObject $pids; if ($pids) { Stop-Process -Id $pids -Force }; Start-Sleep -Seconds 2; npm run dev:index\""
